#### Department of Biostatistics 
#### Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health

I am a master's student in Biostatistics at Columbia University. Prior to joining the program, I worked as a regulatory affairs associate at Pfizer and a pharmacovigilance associate at Merck in South Korea. I received a B.S. in Pharmacy from Ewha Womans University and a M.S. in Pharmacy from Seoul National University.
